info.description: This is the API of Alexandria.
info.title: Alexandria API

post.description:
Create a new branch linked to a project post.
Note that Member IDs passed here, get converted to Collaborator IDs.

get.description: Returns a closed branch given an id
get.summary: Returns a closed branch

get.description: Returns all branch collaborators of the branch with the given ID
get.summary: Get all branch collaborators of a branch

get.description: Get a branch collaborator by ID, a member who has collaborated on a branch
get.summary: Get a branch collaborator by ID

post.description: Adds a branchreview to a branch
post.summary: Adds a branchreview to a branch

get.description: Returns a branchreview with given ID
get.summary: Returns a branchreview

get.description: Get a branch by branch ID
get.summary: Get branch

delete.description: Delete a branch with given ID from database

get.description:
Returns true if the user fulfills the requirements to branchreview the branch
Returns false if user is unauthorized to branchreview the branch
get.summary: Returns whether the user is allowed to branchreview this branch

get.description:
Returns all discussions on this version that are not a reply to another discussion
Endpoint is offset-paginated
get.summary: Returns all level 1 discussions associated with the version

get.description: Get the contents of a single file from a project of a branch
get.summary: Get a file from a project

get.description: Get the render of the repository underlying a branch if it exists and has been rendered successfully
get.summary: Get the render of a branch

get.description: Get the entire zipped repository of a branch
get.summary: Get the repository of a branch

get.description: Returns an array of the statuses of all the reviews of this branch
get.summary: Returns status of all branch reviews

get.description: Get the filetree of a project of a branch
get.summary: Get the filetree of a project

post.description:
Upload a new project version to a specific, preexisting, branch as a zipped quarto project.
Specifically, this zip should contain all of the contents of the project at its root, not in a subdirectory.
Call this after you create a post, and supply it with the actual post contents.
post.summary: Upload a new project version to a branch

get.description: Get a discussion container by its ID, to access its discussions
get.summary: Get discussion container

post.description: Create a new reply-type discussion, so a discussion that is a child of another discussion.

get.description: Gets a discussion report by its ID
get.summary: Gets a discussion report by ID

post.description: Create a new root-level discussion, meaning a discussion that is not a reply.

get.description: Get a discussion by discussion ID
get.summary: Get discussion

delete.description: Delete a discussion with given ID from database

get.description: Get all reports that have been added to this discussion
get.summary: Get all reports of this discussion

post.description: Create a new report for a discussion
post.summary: Add a new report to a discussion

get.description:
Returns all post IDs that meet the requirements in the form
Endpoint is offset-paginated
get.summary: Filters all posts

get.description:
Returns all project post IDs that meet the requirements in the form
Endpoint is offset-paginated
get.summary: Filters all project posts

get.description: Get the ID of every member in the database.
get.summary: Get IDs of all members

post.description: Create a new member from the given fields

get.description: Get a member by member ID
get.summary: Get member from database

delete.description: Delete a member with given ID from database

get.description: Get all branches that this member is a collaborator of
get.summary: Get all branches of this member

get.description: Get all discussions that this member has participated in
get.summary: Get all discussions

get.description: Get all posts that this member is a collaborator of
get.summary: Get all posts of this member

get.description: Get all project posts that this member is a collaborator of
get.summary: Get all project posts of this member

get.description: Get all posts that this member has saved
get.summary: Get all saved posts of this member

post.description: Adds a post to the saved posts of a member

get.description: Get all project posts that this member has saved
get.summary: Get all saved project posts of this member

post.description: Adds a project post to the saved project posts of a member
Create a new question or discussion post. Cannot be a project post.

get.description: Returns all post collaborators of the post with the given ID
get.summary: Get all post collaborators of a post

get.description: Get a post collaborator by ID, a member who has collaborated on a post
get.summary: Get a post collaborator by ID

post.description:
Create a new question or discussion post
Creates a post in the same way as CreatePost
However, the post files are imported from the given Github repository
post.summary: Create new post with the version imported from github

get.description: Gets a post report by its ID
get.summary: Gets a post report by ID

get.description: Get a post by ID
get.summary: Get post by ID

delete.description: Delete a post with given ID from database

get.description: Get the contents of a single file from the main version of a post
get.summary: Get a file from a post

get.description: Get the Project Post ID that encapsulates a Post, if this Project Post exists
get.summary: Get Project Post of Post

get.description: Get the main render of the repository underlying a post if it exists and has been rendered successfully
get.summary: Get the main render of a post

get.description: Get all reports that have been added to this post
get.summary: Get all reports of this post

post.description: Create a new report for a post
post.summary: Add a new report to a post

get.description: Get the entire zipped main repository of a post
get.summary: Get the main repository of a post

get.description:
Get the filetree of a the main version of a post, together with the size of the file in bytes.
Directories have a size of -1.
get.summary: Get the filetree of a post

post.description:
Upload a zipped quarto project to a post. This is the main version of the post, as there are no other versions.
Specifically, this zip should contain all of the contents of the project at its root, not in a subdirectory.
post.summary: Upload a new project version to a branch

post.description: Create a new project post with a single open branch. Upload to this branch in order to have your post reviewed.

Create a new project post
Creates a project post in the same way as CreateProjectPost
However, the post files are imported from the given Github repository
post.summary: Create new project post with the version imported from github

get.description: Get a project post by ID
get.summary: Get project post

delete.description: Delete a project post with given ID from database

get.description: Returns all discussion container IDs on this project post over all its previous merged versions, instead of only the current version
get.summary: Returns all discussion container IDs associated with the project post

get.description: Returns all branch IDs of this project post, grouped by each branch's review status
get.summary: Get branch IDs by review status

get.description: Returns every possible completion status that a Post can have
get.summary: Returns all completion statuses

get.description: Returns every possible feedback preference that a Project Post can have
get.summary: Returns all feedback preferences

get.description: Returns every possible post type that a Post can have
get.summary: Returns all post types

get.description: Returns all scientific tags in the database
get.summary: Returns all scientific tags

get.description: Get a scientific tag container by its ID, to access its scientific tags
get.summary: Get scientific tag container

get.description: Get a scientific field tag by tag ID
get.summary: Get scientific field tag from database

anonymous.description: If anonymous, the discussion will ignore member ID

parentID.description: The Discussion this Discussion will be added to

containerID.description: The DiscussionContainer this Discussion will be added to
